version_description:
Now you can delete previously used stations by longpressing the station name.
New logo for payment with Vipps.

Now you can delete previously used stations by longpressing the station name.
New logo for payment with Vipps.

This release contains a facelift for the departure list, currently only enabled for Oslo - Bergen (more destinations coming shortly).

Some news: showing price per departure, more precise real time information and increased scannability. We hope you

Summer sun, something’s begun!

This final update before summer hits includes a new, simplified booking process for local trains in the Ruter area

And, as always, the release also contains several bug fixes and minor improvements, many of whi

Summer sun, something’s begun!

This final update before summer hits includes a new, simplified booking process for local trains in the Ruter area

And, as always, the release also contains several bug fixes and minor improvements, many of whi

In this update we have made a number of minor improvements. In the station list, we have supported priority stations and hubs, using station icons that indicate whether it's a hub or at an airport.
You will now be asked if you want to save often used

In this update we have made a number of minor improvements. In the station list, we have supported priority stations and hubs, using station icons that indicate whether it's a hub or at an airport.
You will now be asked if you want to save often used

In the previous version of the app there was a bug that made the widget unable to present your active tickets. This is now fixed,  so that you can see your tickets again. As always, we've made improvements under the hood to make the app work even better.<

In the previous version of the app there was a bug that made the widget unable to present your active tickets. This is now fixed,  so that you can see your tickets again. As always, we've made improvements under the hood to make the app work even better.<

Oh my gosh.

Our latest update was supposed to correct a bug in the ticket widget. That failed miserably.

We can’t promise to never make mistakes. We can however promise you to care. That we’ll work relentlessly to give you the best possible

Oh my gosh.

Our latest update was supposed to correct a bug in the ticket widget. That failed miserably.

We can’t promise to never make mistakes. We can however promise you to care. That we’ll work relentlessly to give you the best possible

This releases fixes a bug where clicking a push notification would not open the app on the correct screen.

Thank you to all for sending us feedback at app@nsb.no!

This releases fixes a bug where clicking a push notification would not open the app on the correct screen.

Thank you to all for sending us feedback at app@nsb.no!

Winter is coming!

As the outdoor temperatures decline steadily, we’ve prepared a new version with a brand new form for creating new user profiles. This new form effectively removes a few bugs in the old form (hopefully while introducing zero new on

Winter is coming!

As the outdoor temperatures decline steadily, we’ve prepared a new version with a brand new form for creating new user profiles. This new form effectively removes a few bugs in the old form (hopefully while introducing zero new on

Introducing seat map for commuters with seat reservation on Gjøvikbanen.
As always, keep sending feedback and bug reports to app@nsb.no

Introducing seat map for commuters with seat reservation on Gjøvikbanen.
As always, keep sending feedback and bug reports to app@nsb.no

In this update, we have made improvements in the check out for single tickets, and details of your departure is redesigned with focus on good travel information. This means that buying a single ticket has never been easier. We hope you like the changes! A

In this update, we have made improvements in the check out for single tickets, and details of your departure is redesigned with focus on good travel information. This means that buying a single ticket has never been easier. We hope you like the changes! <

This update mainly contains improvements and fixes:

* NSB now cooperates with Kolumbus (operator in Rogaland) so that you may now use your single ticket on both trains and buses (previously true only for season tickets)
* The app will look bette

This update mainly contains improvements and fixes:

* NSB now cooperates with Kolumbus (operator in Rogaland) so that you may now use your single ticket on both trains and buses (previously true only for season tickets)
* The app will look bette

This update contains improvements and fixes. If you're holding a NSB Customer Card, your card-number will now be pre-filled. Furthermore, we've made improvements to the purchase flow when buying tickets for local trains.

As always, continue to giv

This update contains improvements and fixes. If you're holding a NSB Customer Card, your card-number will now be pre-filled. Furthermore, we've made improvements to the purchase flow when buying tickets for local trains.

As always, continue to giv

This version contains bug fixes and performance improvements.
The most notable addition is improvements concerning text rendering on phones with increased font scaling.

This version contains bug fixes and performance improvements.
The most notable addition is improvements concerning text rendering on phones with increased font scaling.

This version contains new design when purchasing tickets for intercity- and regional trains.

Merry Christmas and happy new year to all travellers!

This version contains new design when purchasing tickets for intercity- and regional trains.

Merry Christmas and happy new year to all travellers!
This version contains a feature that’s been long wished for by our users: the ability to buy tickets for journeys with strollers, dogs or pets!
This version contains a feature that’s been long wished for by our users: the ability to buy tickets for journeys with strollers, dogs or pets!

You can now change part of a journey when it includes a transit exchange

As always, submit your requests and suggestions to app@nsb.no.

As always, submit your requests and suggestions to app@nsb.no.

In addition to train departures, you'll now also see travel alternatives with Nettbuss on selected destinations.

Welcome the the new Vy app!

We have a new look, but you can buy tickets and receive notifications as per usual. On top of that, we offer both train and bus departures for certain destinations.

Have a nice journey!

Currently, only a few, select destinations are supported. More destinations will follow shortly.

- Remaining validity of a season ticket in the Today Widget was illegible

This update enables purchasing extra products for bus tickets, namely extra luggage, special luggage and comfort package.

It also contains several stability improvements and bug fixes.

Would you like to send us feedback about the app? Mail u

For some selected app users, we are now launching the opportunity to book a taxi in Fredrikstad. If you are not one of the lucky people living in Fredrikstad, we have also made a number of improvements to the app, and prepared for a whole new travel plann

For some selected app users, we are now launching the opportunity to book a taxi in Fredrikstad. If you are not one of the lucky people living in Fredrikstad, we have also made a number of improvements to the app, and prepared for a whole new travel plann

You can now use the Vy app to book taxis in both Fredrikstad and Sarpsborg, whether you are traveling now or later.
In addition, you can try our new travel planner that will take you door to door by train, bus, boat, tram and boat.
For those of you

Under 'Find journey' you can now see where the train is and your entire journey in the map. Commuters will also be able to see the train's position under Favorites.

Remember that you can see the capacity of trains in the app, and choose a departur

An improved app from 16 November
Vy aims to make it easy to travel in a way that is environmentally friendly from door to door – not just between stations and bus stops. That’s why we have made some big changes in the Vy app.
